targets.rawSql:
SELECT  journey, 
        max(avaSlo) as 'ava slo',
        ifnull(AVG(NULLIF(ava_debt ,0)),0) as 'ava debt',
        max(expSlo) as 'exp slo',
        ifnull(AVG(NULLIF(exp_debt ,0)),0) as 'exp debt',
        max(latSlo) as 'lat slo',
        ifnull(AVG(NULLIF(lat_debt ,0)),0) as 'lat debt'
FROM HourlyJourney
WHERE
$__timeFilter(start) 
Group by journey

SELECT name, email
FROM 
  Journeys J join JourneyLeaders JL on J.id = JL.journeyId 
  join Members M on JL.memberId = M.id
where J.journey = '$journey'

SELECT  feature, 
        max(avaSlo) as 'ava slo',
        ifnull(AVG(NULLIF(ava_debt ,0)),0) as 'ava debt',
        max(expSlo) as 'exp slo',
        ifnull(AVG(NULLIF(exp_debt ,0)),0) as 'exp debt',
        max(latSlo) as 'lat slo',
        ifnull(AVG(NULLIF(lat_debt ,0)),0) as 'lat debt'
FROM HourlyJourney
WHERE
$__timeFilter(start)  and journey='$journey'
Group by feature

SELECT
  ifnull(avg(nullif(ava_debt,0)),0)  as 'debt'
FROM HourlyJourney
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start)   and journey = '$journey'

SELECT
  avg(exp_debt)  as 'debt'
FROM HourlyJourney
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start) and exp_debt > 0  and journey = '$journey'

SELECT
  avg(lat_debt) as 'debt'
FROM HourlyJourney
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start) and journey = '$journey' and lat_debt > 0

SELECT
  feature, 
  avg(ava_debt) as 'debt'
FROM HourlyJourney
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start) and journey = '$journey'
group by feature

SELECT
  feature, 
  avg(exp_debt) as 'debt'
FROM HourlyJourney
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start) and journey = '$journey'
group by feature

SELECT
  feature, 
  avg(lat_debt) as 'debt'
FROM HourlyJourney
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start) and journey = '$journey'
group by feature

SELECT
  start AS "time",
  feature,
  sum(total) as 'request'
FROM HourlyJourney
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start) and journey = '$journey'
group by feature, start
ORDER BY start

SELECT
  start AS "time",
  feature,
  avg(lat) as 'latency ms'
FROM HourlyJourney
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start) and journey = '$journey'
group by start, feature
ORDER BY start

SELECT
  start AS "time",
  feature,
  avg(nullif(ava_debt, 0)) as 'debt'
FROM HourlyJourney
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start) and journey = '$journey'
group by start, feature

SELECT
  start AS "time",
  feature,
  avg(nullif(exp_debt, 0)) as 'debt'
FROM HourlyJourney
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start) and journey = '$journey'
group by start, feature

SELECT
  start AS "time",
  feature,
  avg(nullif(lat_debt, 0)) as 'debt'
FROM HourlyJourney
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start) and journey = '$journey'
group by start, feature

SELECT
  start AS "time",
  ifnull(ava_debt,0)
FROM HourlyJourney
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start) and journey = '$journey' and ava_debt > 0
ORDER BY start

SELECT
  start AS "time",
  ifnull(exp_debt,0)
FROM HourlyJourney
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start) and journey = '$journey' and exp_debt > 0
ORDER BY start

SELECT
  start AS "time",
  ifnull(lat_debt, 0)
FROM HourlyJourney
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start) and journey = '$journey' and lat_debt > 0
ORDER BY start

options.content:
# Feature:  $feature 

Reliability debt analysis for feature

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  source, 
        max(avaSlo) as 'ava slo',
        ifnull(AVG(NULLIF(ava_debt ,0)),0) as 'ava debt',
        max(expSlo) as 'exp slo',
        ifnull(AVG(NULLIF(exp_debt ,0)),0) as 'exp debt',
        max(latSlo) as 'lat slo',
        ifnull(AVG(NULLIF(lat_debt ,0)),0) as 'lat debt'
FROM HourlyJourney
WHERE
$__timeFilter(start) and feature = '$feature'
Group by source
